findRequiredSupervisor

public Supervisor findRequiredSupervisor(java.lang.Object supervisorName)
Description copied from interface: CoreMgr
Find an Supervisor or throw an Exception, if none can't be found.

This method performs successive calls to the datastore, using different criteria, to cover all possibilities to retrieve an supervisor.

Specified by:
findRequiredSupervisor in interface CoreMgr
